titleStmt.title: Eight sermons, vpon the first foure chapters, and part of the fift, of Ecclesiastes Preached at Mauldon, by G. Giffard.
titleStmt.author: Gifford, George, d. 1620.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Windet for Toby Cooke, at the Tygers head in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Eight sermons, each with caption title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
